Sentencas: Hybrid polymer-yttria-zirconia xerogels have been used to prepare freestanding and crack free cubic yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) films.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure

Sentencas: Depending on the final ceramic properties, these materials could find application as components in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure

Sentencas: Different types of organic and bioorganic molecules such as albumin, starch, sucrose, dextran, carboxymethylcellulose, and polyvinyl alcohol, have been studied in order to prepare polymer-oxide nanocomposites.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure

Sentencas: The reason for adding a polymer to a sol-gel-derived inorganic network stays in avoiding cracks formation during the pyrolysis process, which converts the preceramic into the ceramic material.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure

Sentencas: Polymers behave as stress relaxing agents and allow obtaining dense and crack free final ceramics.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure

Sentencas: The differences in polymer chemical structure and solubility impose variable synthesis procedures, and limit the availability of suitable yttria precursors.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure

Sentencas: We present here a study concerning the influence of different polymers on the microstructural properties of yttria-zirconia films.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure

Sentencas: Thermogravimetric analyses (TGA), SEM, XRD, N-2 sorption and density measurements have been used to characterize the polymer-to-ceramic transformation and the final ceramic materials.
Titulo: YSZ freestanding films from hybrid polymer-oxide composites by the sol-gel process:: Influence of polymer features on ceramic microstructure
